antha jathiwadi dakune deshapalanagnyayaku ee wenuwen me wana witath siya gola balayin haraha yapanaya wishwa widyalaye sinhala shishya sangamaye kriyakarin kihipadenekuwa danuwath kara athi athara madhya meheyum da aarambha kara athi bawada wartha weyi.mema siduwima sanhindiyawa wenuwen uthure athi sudanama boruwak lesa dakwamin prakasha nikuth kirimatath ee hama awasthawakadima warada aanduwata pawaramin katha karana lesath ehidi upades di athi bawada wartha we.mema upades dakune jathiwadi rala wethin owunge bili boyisla lesa sitina yapanaya wishwa widyalaye sinhala shishya sangamaye kriyakarin athata pathkaranne ada eeye sita nowana athara ee gana thorathuruda apata labi atha.
